h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat
content: Be sure to head back near the Northern Shore Shrine, and you'll find his glowing green tear. It is actually a **Turtle Tear Gourd Soak** , and can be incredibly useful as the only surefire means of restoring your mana when using your Gourd!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Apramana Bat'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to head back near the Northern Shore Shrine, and you'll find his glowing green tear. It is actually a **Turtle Tear Gourd Soak** , and can be incredibly useful as the only surefire means of restoring your mana when using your Gourd!
